name: Alice's Hope
description:
Prototype of a game that features a jolly character that hops and shoots her way into freedom, in this retro/pixel-art action platform game.

Alpha 0.8.6 - October 4th, 2017:
- Load menu tweaks,
- Some level development.
- Performance enhancements,
- Bug fixes.

Alpha 0.8.5 - October 2nd, 2017
- Fixed some horizontal moving platforms,
- Small GUI tweaks.

Alpha 0.8.4 - October 1st, 2017
- Redone some sprites,
- A lot of bugs fixed,
- Particle effects added,
- Three Save Slots,
- Keyboard rebinds,
- Other minor stuff

Alpha 0.2.0 - July 7th, 2017
- Complete Re-write of the game engine.
- Levels were re-designed.

Alpha 0.1.1 - March 30th, 2017
- Fixed minor bugs.
- Notification added when the game is saved.
